mapper.insert: insert into board_pet_reple (board_idx, myid, message, photo, regroup, relevel, restep, writeday) values (#{board_idx}, #{myid}, #{message}, #{photo}, #{regroup}, #{relevel}, #{restep}, now());
mapper.select: select * from boardreple where board_idx=#{board_idx} order by idx desc
select photo from boardreple where idx=#{idx}
mapper.update: update boardreple set message=#{message} where idx=#{idx}
